fn.p: Author Contributions J.H., H.M. and B.E. initiated the collaboration project, J.H., H.M. and A.B.M. collected samples and performed fieldwork. J.H.O. and A.B.M. performed laboratory investigations and compiled and analysed the data. A.W.-N. analysed the representativeness of study sites. J.H. and A.B.M. wrote the paper with input from all co-authors.
